 void closeFrame(Frame frame)
          public void closeTrack(String trackname) { Frame frameTrackIsIn = null; ViewTrack track = null; for (Frame f : this.getFrames()) { for (ViewTrack t : f.getTracks()) { if (t.getName().equals(trackname)) { frameTrackIsIn = f; track = t; break; } } if (frameTrackIsIn != null) { break; } } frameTrackIsIn.getTracks().remove(track); if (frameTrackIsIn.getTracks().size() == 0) { closeFrame(frameTrackIsIn); } }

closeFrame

public void closeFrame(Frame frame)
public void closeTrack(String trackname) { Frame frameTrackIsIn = null; ViewTrack track = null; for (Frame f : this.getFrames()) { for (ViewTrack t : f.getTracks()) { if (t.getName().equals(trackname)) { frameTrackIsIn = f; track = t; break; } } if (frameTrackIsIn != null) { break; } } frameTrackIsIn.getTracks().remove(track); if (frameTrackIsIn.getTracks().size() == 0) { closeFrame(frameTrackIsIn); } }

getFrames

public java.util.List<Frame> getFrames()
